Posts.Content: rachalie8 wrote: Hi everyone, I have been reading these boards for a few weeks now and all of you are so helpful and supportive.  I went for my first mammogram in the beginning of March as I will be 40 in a few weeks.  I joked around about being old and said it wasn't a big deal...until I got the call to come back.  I had a second (diagnostic?) mammogram and an ultrasound about a week and a half ago.  The radiologist said that she couldn't be 100% sure that it was nothing so she referred me to a surgeon.  She said on the ultrasound there was "shadowing" which I think she said meant a solid mass instead of a fluid filled cyst.  Although, I may have read that too, it all happened so fast!  She also said that one side of the oval shape was smooth which was good, but the other side was not.  There was only one spot and it was very small.  So, now I go tomorrow at 4 to see a very highly recommended breast surgeon (recommended by my doctor who sent his wife to her and also by a friend who has just recently finished all her treatments for BC.  I don't know if it is just a consultation or if she will do the biopsy.  Luckily, I have a very busy day tomorrow at work so I won't be worried about it all day.  But, I am not finding it to easy to go to bed tonight, just really worried.  My twin girls turn 8 on Friday, so I hope it will be a happy day! Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Appt with BS tomorrow rachalie8 bebe51

Posts.Content: Apr 1, 2010 11:53AM rachalie8 wrote: Thanks for the good thoughts everyone.  I went to the BS yesterday and needless to say I was so incredibly nervous.  But, she came in and was very laid back and really made me feel better.  After looking at the tests, she said that she had a low concern for cancer, but not zero.  So, it needs to come out.  She said that I am a perfect candidate for a BLES procedure.  Has anyone heard of this?  I haven't had time to do much research on it, but she said she does about 250 a year (I think it has been around for a few years).  If anyone has any info on this procedure, I would appreciate it.  I am waiting for them to call and schedule, but she said it will probably be next Thursday.
Posts.Title: Appt with BS tomorrow rachalie8 bebe51
